title: XFL draft Day 2 live blog: Follow along as teams fill out their roster
text:
CLOSE

Day 2 of the XFL draft starts at 10 a.m. ET. The eight XFL teams — the Dallas Renegades, DC Defenders, Houston Roughnecks, Los Angeles Wildcats, New York Guardians, Seattle Dragons, St. Louis Battlehawks and Tampa Bay Vipers — are filling their 71-person rosters.

In three phases yesterday, the XFL drafted skilled players, offensive linemen and defensive front seven.

Today, XFL teams will draft defensive backs in the first 10-round phase. The final phase will be an open draft for all remaining players, in addition to punters, kickers and long snappers.

Take a look at how Day 1 played out with every pick here. Here are some takeaways: the XFL values experience.

The XFL is set to relaunch in February 2020. (Photo: Etienne Laurent, EPA-EFE)

DEFENSIVE BACKS
description: Day 2 of XFL draft begins at 10 a.m. ET. Today, XFL teams will draft defensive backs in first phase, followed by an open draft for remaining players.
